hotels.name: Kimpton Surfcomber Hotel
hotels.short_desc: Enjoy style, glamour and luxury in the heart of South Beach at the vibrant and unique Kimpton Surfcomber Hotel.

hotels.name: Trump International Beach Resort Miami
hotels.short_desc: Splash, play, and relax at Sunny Isle Beach's tropical playground of sea and sand. Luxurious pool, and beach await at the Trump!

hotels.name: 1 Hotel South Beach
hotels.short_desc: Discover Tala Beach, the beachside restaurant and outdoor beach retreat, nestled within the stunning 1 Hotel South Beach.

hotels.name: Tidal Cove Waterpark at JW Marriott Miami Turnberry Resort & Spa
hotels.short_desc: Daring drops, turns, and twisting spirals await when you make a splash at JW Marriott Miami Turnberry's brand new water park, Tidal Cove.

hotels.name: Eden Roc Miami Beach
hotels.short_desc: Enjoy beachfront pools, white sand beach, and spacious day rooms at this timeless resort.

hotels.name: The Ritz-Carlton Bal Harbour, Miami
hotels.short_desc: Make a lasting memory in Miami at the luxurious Ritz-Carlton Bal Harbour, Miami. Look no further for the ultimate getaway, where chic poolside dining and spirited drinks are plentiful.

hotels.name: The Miami Beach EDITION
hotels.short_desc: Revive mind, body and spirit at The Spa at The Miami Beach EDITION.

hotels.name: Carillon Miami Wellness Resort
hotels.short_desc: With two sparkling pools, premiere beach access and a renowned Spa, the Carillon Miami is a dream tropical getaway.

hotels.name: Gale Miami Hotel and Residences
hotels.short_desc: Step into Gale Miami, offering a swim club and a wellness center complete with a spa and gym.

hotels.name: The Savoy Hotel & Beach Club
hotels.short_desc: Spend a day at South Beach's incredible oceanside paradise. The beautiful and vibrant pool and beach provides the best resort amenities for a dreamy daycation.

hotels.name: The Ritz-Carlton, South Beach
hotels.short_desc: Experience luxury at its finest at the incredible Ritz-Carlton, South Beach.  Premium plush pool chairs, daybeds, and cabanas with sweeping ocean views and exceptional service are the hallmarks at the Ritz.

hotels.name: Hilton Miami Airport Blue Lagoon
hotels.short_desc: Go for a swim in the outdoor pool overlooking the water at the Hilton Miami Airport Blue Lagoon, an expansive hotel located on a peninsula overlooking the Blue Lagoon.

hotels.name: Mayfair House Hotel and Garden
hotels.short_desc: Spend a day in luxury at this boutique property featuring a rooftop pool and bar.

hotels.name: Grand Beach Hotel
hotels.short_desc: The top rated and guest-favorite Grand Beach Hotel offers the highest levels of luxury and service, featuring 3 pools, 4 hot tubs, and beach access.

hotels.name: Hotel Riu Plaza Miami Beach
hotels.short_desc: Lounge by the pool or on the sand at the Hotel Riu Plaza Miami Beach, an oceanfront hotel in the heart of Miamis famed Art Deco district.

hotels.name: The Sagamore Hotel South Beach
hotels.short_desc: Find yourself at The Sagamore Hotel South Beach, an oceanfront destination situated in Miami Beachs historic Art Deco District.

hotels.name: Dua Hotel Miami, Autograph Collection
hotels.short_desc: Experience the hottest rooftop pool scene in Miami at the eclectic Dua Hotel Miami featuring an amazing pool, spa amenities, and delicious fare.

hotels.name: Newport Beachside Hotel & Resort
hotels.short_desc: Lounge by the pool, or enjoy the beach at this beachfront property.

hotels.name: Hilton Cabana Miami Beach Resort
hotels.short_desc: Experience a daycation Miami style with two oceanview pools, a hot tub, private cabanas, beach access, and plenty of food and drinks.

hotels.name: Pullman Miami Airport Hotel
hotels.short_desc: Spend a day of soaking up the Florida sunshine at Pullman Miami Airport with a waterfront pool, fitness center, and Mediterranean food and beverage from Tavalo.

hotels.name: The Tony Hotel South Beach
hotels.short_desc: The Hotel of South Beach is the perfect place to spend the day with an adults-only rooftop pool, beach access, poolside food and drink service, and more.

hotels.name: Moxy Miami South Beach
hotels.short_desc: Grab friends, lovers, and family for an exciting daycation unlike any other at Moxy Miami South Beach with a 72-foot pool, private daybeds, a rooftop lounge pool with submerged lounge chairs and panoramic views of Miami Beach.

hotels.name: Cadillac Hotel & Beach Club, Autograph Collection
hotels.short_desc: Theres something special about the Cadillac Hotel & Beach Club, Autograph Collection, an oceanfront art deco resort with two swimming pools and beach access.

hotels.name: Kimpton Epic Miami
hotels.short_desc: Experience the vibrance of Miami poolside at the Kimpton Epic Hotel. Lounge with glorious views of Miami, enjoy two shimmering pools, and sip your favorite cocktail.

hotels.name: InterContinental Miami
hotels.short_desc: Treat yourself to a premier luxury experience at the InterContinental Miami and enjoy luxurious pool and spa amenities, waterfront views and delicious poolside fare.

hotels.name: The Gates Hotel South Beach
hotels.short_desc: Take in waterfront views and enjoy luxurious pool and beach amenities at the Gates located in the heart of South Beach.

hotels.name: Aloft Miami Airport Hotel
hotels.short_desc: Relax in style at the hip and modern Aloft Miami Airport with an outdoor pool under swaying palm trees, well-equipped fitness center and more.

hotels.name: Miami Airport Marriott
hotels.short_desc: Relax at this newly renovated airport property.

hotels.name: EAST Miami
hotels.short_desc: Experience a day at this trendy and tropical property in downtown Miami with pools, hot tubs, and award-wining bars and restaurants.

hotels.name: The Ritz-Carlton Coconut Grove, Miami
hotels.short_desc: Experience a first-class daycation at the Ritz-Carlton Coconut Grove, Miami with a tranquil pool, cabanas, food, and cocktails.
